.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-vkGetImageMemoryRequirements2-device-parameter]] pname:device must: be a valid sname:VkDevice handle
* [[VUID-vkGetImageMemoryRequirements2-pInfo-parameter]] pname:pInfo must: be a valid pointer to a valid sname:VkImageMemoryRequirementsInfo2 structure
* [[VUID-vkGetImageMemoryRequirements2-pMemoryRequirements-parameter]] pname:pMemoryRequirements must: be a valid pointer to a sname:VkMemoryRequirements2 structure
